defs: = ಕುಲಕರಣಿಕೆ.
a woman who defiles the good name, reputation of her family.
a profession, vocation that is carried on hereditarily; a family vocation.

a blemish of a family.

a person who is or regarded to be, the preceptor for several generations of a family; a family-teacher.

to spoil the purity or sanctity of a family.
to spoil the honour, esteem of a family or lineage.
to destroy, defile the system, arrangement, etc.; to abuse; to use wrongly or in an offensive manner (as a language etc.); to bungle.
(the purity or sanctity of one's lineage) to be defiled.
(the honour, esteem, reputation of a caste) to be spoiled.
(in gen.) to be spoiled; to go off the right path or way; to be abused or used in an offensive manner; to bungle.
a man who defiles the purity of his lineage.
a man who destroys the reputation, honour, status of his family.
he who abuses, spoils the arrangement, system, etc. (in gen.).
a woman who defiles the purity of her lineage.
a woman who destroys the reputation, honour, status of her family.
she who abuses, spoils the arrangement, system, etc. (in gen.).
a person who defiles the purity of his or her lineage.
a person who destroys the reputation, honour, status of his or her family.
he or she who abuses, spoils the arrangement, system, etc. (in gen.).
a person who is prohibited by his or her family from participating in family-related religious matters.

lively, joyous play or playfulness; amusement, sport, recreation, etc.; a fun.
well-being, happiness; health and prosperity; well-being.
a large gun or cannon used to fire as a ceremonial gesture on the occasion of greeting, welcoming a person or as a mark of celebration of a joyous moment.
= ಕುಶಾಲುತೋಪು.
